question: Which of the following was the main purpose of the meeting of William Bentinck with Ranjit Singh in the year 1831?
explanation: William Bentinck met Maharaja Ranjit Singh in the year 1831 (26th October) at Rupnagar (Ropar). They signed a treaty which is also known as the Rupnagar treaty of 1831. The main purpose of the treaty was to become united against Russia.
